participant_abstract.sent: Each person presented design and construction options, and then expressed her personal preferences.
Through discussion we decided on which options we would like to include in our design.
We're going for a simplistic style, a trendy design including fruit and vegetable, and an innovative energy source (kinetic).

participant_actions.sent: Poppy and Tara will make a prototype out of playdough.
Genevieve will do a marketing product evaluation.

participant_problems.sent: we didn't know if we should have a back-up source of battery power in case the kinetic system fails.
None of us were very interested in fruits and vegetables because we don't personally like that style.
